full_text: @KellieTallant_ @DeirdreMooney You’re correct Kellie. It is a shame that they haven’t been let yet however it is something that my colleague & local councillor for Dalkey @JustinMoylan has been raising with the Council and they are completing considerable internal structural works. Should be completed soon.
I agree Alan. Appalling scenes for the local community and Gardaí to have to contend with. Utter lawlessness. https://t.co/B8mjwyugsl

Poignant ceremony at Killiney Dart Station to remember Garda Vincent Ryan who lost his life while on duty near the train station on 18th Sept 1954, 68 years ago today     Thanks to Killiney Community Council, @gardainfo, @IrishRail & @GardaRetired for organising the ceremony https://t.co/FW86osVXOG

Fantastic atmosphere in Kilbogget Park, Cabinteely for #IndiaFest, a celebration and showcase of Indian culture with wonderful music, dance and food.   Well done to everyone involved! Especially all the volunteers, @dlrcc staff, Dún Laoghaire @gardainfo & @CivilDefenceIRL 🇮🇪🇮🇳 https://t.co/NSLkzgkzKj

Lovely to join Margaret Brown and volunteers from Sandycove Tidy Towns for a clean up of the seafront.  The clean up was supported by @dlrcc as part of the international Clean Coasts initiative to remove plastic from our marine environment. https://t.co/ltx95gSrtA

What an atmosphere at the @EmbaMex_Irlanda earlier as we bid d farewell to His Excellency @MMalfavonA and his wife Hanna and to thank them for their exceptional time here in Ireland. They’ve done so much to strengthen relations between Ireland & Mexico. Muchas gracias! 🇮🇪 🇲🇽 https://t.co/1m6zWpNZGZ
Thanks to all of our Defence Force personnel for their service. 🇮🇪 🇺🇳 #NatServicesDay https://t.co/lxAgAdhscB

Raised the need for unprecedented support for households and businesses in Budget 2023, to deal with the energy crisis caused by Russia's War in Ukraine, at a special Oireachtas meeting today. https://t.co/LMdY4ZT52Y

Attending the Oireachtas Climate Action Committee this afternoon to question Minister Ryan and #CRU & #Eirgrid officials about their plans to deal with the #EnergyCrisis.   We need to see unprecedented support for households and businesses this winter. https://t.co/xNo6Z3MfOP

Fantastic atmosphere in Dalkey for the #DalkeyLobsterFestival. It's great to see the town so busy!   Well done to everyone who organised the weekend, John T, Cllr Justin Moylan, the event committee, DLR outdoor staff and especially the Gardaí for keeping everyone safe 👏 https://t.co/loq62iLwNI
Great to join Ukrainians in Ireland to mark their Independence Day.   Ireland stands with the people of Ukraine. #SlavaUkraïni @ukraineireland 🇮🇪🇺🇦 https://t.co/6iaXj3stGV

There is great hope & resolve in Ukraine. Rebuilding efforts, supported by the international community, have already begun, like this emergency hospital near Bucha.   With Europe's support I know the people of Ukraine will prevail @a_loverdos #SlavaUkraini #StandWithUkraine 🇺🇦🇪🇺 https://t.co/ic692ryQr1

Kyiv is still subject to threat from Russia, parts of the city are basically blacked out for safety. Last night the air raid sirens went off at 5am and people in our hotel had to evacuate to a secure location. This is how Ukrainians have to live every day due to Russia's war https://t.co/qxmA3jCjRv

Homes, schools, hospitals and civilians were all targets during the invasion of Ukraine. This European Cultural Centre in Irpin was destroyed, even the flags outside, including the Irish Tricolour were shot up by Russian forces. #SlavaUkraini #StandWithUkraine 🇮🇪🇺🇦 https://t.co/0DGjzH9FqO

Hundreds of thousands of people have been left homeless by Russia's war in Ukraine, millions have had to flee. You can see the damage everywhere. So many lives destroyed by a needless war of aggression. #SlavaUkraini #StandWithUkraine 🇮🇪🇺🇦 https://t.co/swegjWRqKA

Travelled to Bucha today to witness first hand the destruction and human suffering the people of Ukraine endured during the Russian war and occupation.   The pre-school at Makariv was destroyed by Russian forces. #SlavaUkraini #StandWithUkraine 🇮🇪🇺🇦 https://t.co/L9MFcSQ4fV

Visiting #Kyiv with a #U4U delegation to see the impact of the war and support the people of Ukraine ahead of their National Day.   We met with the Speaker of the Rada @r_stefanchuk, Deputy Prime Minister @StefanishynaO, Deputy Speaker @OlekKorn and other officials. 🇮🇪🇺🇦🇪🇺 https://t.co/HMUUBb4szP

All public transport workers and customers deserve to be safe and secure on DART, LUAS and Dublin bus services - a dedicated Garda public transport unit is urgently needed, particularly in Dublin. @NBRU_DUBLIN https://t.co/e82rkGa8Ys
@margaretrmoore @DalkeyF @dlrcc @DarraghOBrienTD Thanks Margaret. I and my colleague and councillor for the Dalkey area @JustinMoylan will raise it with the Council and revert.

Welcome to Blackrock’s newest bar,@TheBlackrock_ which has opened in the heart of the town.   They’ve done a superb job with the renovations (including an outdoor terrace) and the food. Well worth a visit & I wish all the team very well in the future. #blackrock https://t.co/5hWbuvAlTs

Thank you for highlighting this. Our bye-laws must be enforced for the safety of all sea swimmers and other activities diving, sailing, etc. I’ll write to both the local Council, Gardaí & Defence Forces to highlight this on-going issue and breach of existing bye-laws. https://t.co/fhKML3RM7T

While I welcome this Gardaí initiative, we need to see this as a permanent dedicated transport unit across all transport. In the meantime @fiannafailparty want to hear your views about safety on public transport https://t.co/fsZSzSmLiJ #FFTransportSurvey https://t.co/DdzOCpWQSl
Well done @DubFireBrigade & Gardaí for all your tremendous work yesterday and throughout the night to keep local residents safe. https://t.co/zgDAsMk0G2

Serious gorse fire in #Killiney tonight threatening a number of homes. Hopefully it will be brought under control soon, a challenging and very worrying night for all affected.   Thank you to everyone in @DubFireBrigade and @GardaTraffic for their efforts. https://t.co/fz0iDhib1G

Some fantastic photos and historical items on display at the Blackrock Garda Commemoration today - including a lovely photo of Máire Geoghegan-Quinn during her visit to Blackrock as Minister for Justice 1994. https://t.co/aZIwwsoCQJ

Lovely to join Gardaí at Blackrock Garda station for an event to mark 100 years of their work in the community.   It was great to be joined by the Leas-Chathaoirleach Cllr Michael Clark, Councillor Kate Feeney, public reps, serving and retired Gardaí and their families. https://t.co/znRxWB1KWE
Well done @OgraFiannaFail and thanks for your support 💪🏻 https://t.co/2NDKG06lRp

What a cracking day for the #DunLaoghaire Regatta. Councillor @JustinMoylan and thoroughly enjoyed it.  Thanks to @RowDunLaoghaire for their invitation and for their warm welcome.  Well done to our two local clubs; St Michael’s & the @DalkeyRowing #rowingregatta https://t.co/mX98bblVDn
Lovely to welcome the Taoiseach to Dun Laoghaire for the annual Seán Lemass Commemoration at Deansgrange Cemetery. Beautiful day for it. https://t.co/pheaWJf7aO

📢 We launched our public transport safety survey today.   We want to hear from public transport users about your experiences on Dublin bus, DART, LUAS, and taxi services in the capital.   Click below for more info and to take the 2 min survey ⤵️ https://t.co/m1PIqkIEok https://t.co/kbBnvZL4GE

Lovely to visit St. John's School, Ballybrack and St. Brigid's Girls School, Cabinteely with Minister Norma Foley to see the fantastic work being done by school communities on this year's expanded Summer Provision programme. https://t.co/1yUsSvfM6u

Joined President Higgins, An Taoiseach Micheál Martin, public representatives & members of the Defence Forces & their families at Collins Barracks for the National Day of Commemoration to honour all those Irishmen & Irishwomen who died in past wars or on service with the UN 🇮🇪🇺🇳 https://t.co/JbaunYmREq

Lovely to join Gardaí at Cabinteely Garda station for an event to mark 100 years of their work in the community.   It was great to be joined by the Cathaoirleach Cllr Mary Hanafin, Councillors Michael Clark and Justin Moylan, and serving and retired Gardaí and their families. https://t.co/BYqtAo9vAs
Thank you to @alzheimersocirl for their informative pre-Budget submission earlier today. #DementiaCantWait #TeamASI https://t.co/r9j2G7Hn4S

A wonderful visit to the #Loughlinstown Training Centre for their Open Day earlier with councillor Michael Clark. There are some excellent initiatives being run: https://t.co/ylBDLSJmnx #Training #apprenticeships https://t.co/KLmKm8dzrq
Interesting briefing from the Irish Cancer Society about the need to #cutthecosts for cancer patients and their families in #Budget2023. https://t.co/cwyleu8V9b
Great atmosphere in Sallynoggin for the community Street Fest. Well done to everyone involved in organising the day. https://t.co/yHMCh0GDM3
Fantastic atmosphere in Dublin City for the #Pride march  #HappyPride 🏳️‍🌈 https://t.co/XgRUtRlqZJ

Great news - it was confirmed today that a contractor has been appointed & that construction will start in September on 597 new homes at the former Shanganagh Castle Prison site   The #HousingforAll project includes 200 social homes, 91 affordable purchase & 306 cost rental units https://t.co/jFcEj9IfWv

Great afternoon at the Cabinteely FC Mini World Cup at Kilbogget Park. Well done to the committee for organising the event and all the volunteers and parents who made it a fantastic day out for the kids https://t.co/eaKxf1nFCF
🚨FYI to all sea swimmers 🚨 https://t.co/Q0KbYVOGkv

DLR Council are recruiting Lifeguards for the Summer Bathing Season. It's a great opportunity with very competitive pay.   The closing date for applications is 12 noon on Thursday 23rd June 2022. Full details here:   https://t.co/b4QTuf7Atk https://t.co/u3U5n3lEIh

Lovely to join Senator David Norris and Oireachtas colleagues for the hanging of his portrait in Leinster House which acknowledges his outstanding contribution to the Seanad and Irish society over many decades https://t.co/GXTyaU6ewN

Fantastic atmosphere in Glasthule and Sandycove for the start of #Bloomsday2022 celebrations.   Wonderful to see so many people visiting Dún Laoghaire to celebrate Joyce.  Well done to Peter Caviston, John T. Murphy, Tom Fitzgerald & everyone involved in organising the events https://t.co/UxUVtuDWqu
Happy Bloomsday! #Bloomsday2022 https://t.co/qxjsXpuFMc
An apt reminder from #Lithuania given current day events... https://t.co/8cILQx7bUd

Thank you to the #Blackrock Education Centre for the invite to attend their superb Write a Book #WAB Awards' Ceremony. I was very impressed with the talent and creativity of all of the youngsters! https://t.co/hsMUetLXqw

A very stark and sobering message for TD’s at a briefing organised by @Dochasnetwork which was contributed to by @trocaire @Concern @GOAL_Global @OxfamEU on the looming food crisis in the #HornofAfricaCrisis #SoundingTheAlarmOnExtremeHunger #WeNeedToDoMore https://t.co/UdqlEes03A

@Casey5122dark @Smugachan @dlrcc Hi Gerard, thanks for letting me know. If you would like to DM or email me (cormac@cormacdevlin.ie) the details I would be happy to get Cllr Michael Clark to raise it with Council officials

Congratulations to Cllr. Mary Hanafin on her election as Cathaoirleach of Dún Laoghaire Rathdown County Council, also to Cllr. Michael Clark on his election as Leas Cathaoirleach. Wishing them every success during the year ahead. https://t.co/fIhbjZHDXE
Wishing @BallybrackBulls all of the very best in the Euro Championships 🏀 https://t.co/nVlhgBZhPv

Fantastic to join volunteers from the RNLI Lifeboats at Dún Laoghaire Harbour for the launch of their new D class lifeboat D-865 ‘Joval’  It was great to be joined by Cllr Justin Moylan, local Gardaí, and representatives of Mrs Valerie Staunton, Co. Offaly who funded the new boat https://t.co/J6WPq2PdBw
A wonderful way to encourage your children to keep reading during the summer months #SummerStars …well done @DLR_Libraries for organising it once again 👏🏻👏🏻 https://t.co/U6avOqHm6I
A broad ranging, comprehensive address by An Taoiseach @MichealMartinTD this morning. Very well received across the @Europarl_EN https://t.co/LnbHTp9Vkb

Great engagement with young people from @Foroige and @ComhairleNaNog1 during a special meeting of the Climate Action Committee in the #Seanad Chamber.   Thanks to Cathaoirleach Senator Mark Daly for facilitating the debate 👏 https://t.co/FfmB6uIVBz
@charlotteokelly @PassportIRL @CarrollJennifer Hi Charlotte, sorry to hear about that. Can you give my office a call on 01 275 0786 or email the details to cormac@cormacdevlin.ie?

Wonderful to welcome the women from Ballybrack Ladies Club to the Dáil today.   Thanks to Cllr. Michael Clark for taking the time to join the tour of Leinster House and to all the Oireachtas staff for looking after us 👏 https://t.co/cmdR9B4sjo
It was wonderful to meet and engage with the EU Commissioner for Energy @KadriSimson at the Joint Committee on Environment & Climate Action today. https://t.co/5FIp7a5ygH

Fantastic afternoon at the Dáil with the ladies from the Young at Hearts active retirement group from Ballybrack and Loughlinstown. Thanks to Cllr Michael Clark for joining the visit and tour of Leinster House. https://t.co/0Zk1YjoyHX

Great to meet Front Line Defenders last week at the Dáil and Dept of Foreign Affairs for a series of meetings to highlight their work protecting human rights and freedoms. #FLDAward22 ⤵️ https://t.co/wyEkO3wHON

Delighted to join my colleagues from the #Ireland - #US Friendship Group as we met and chatted with the U.S. Ambassador to Ireland, Her Excellency Claire Cronin at her residence earlier this evening. https://t.co/votKNuEF05

Lovely to join players, coaches and families from Granada Football Club, Blackrock at County Hall ahead of their visit to Vincennes, France in June. Wishing all the players the best of luck as they represent their club and county! 👏 https://t.co/5NRVrm3w7l

Delighted to join Minister @DarraghOBrienTD in Stillorgan earlier today at the official launch of the upgraded reservoir which will serve more than 200,000 homes in south Dublin. https://t.co/6R43BqMKP9

Fantastic to see the new @IrishWater covered reservoir in Stillorgan completed - the €50m investment will provide a secure and sustainable supply of water to over 200,000 people in South Dublin. https://t.co/uN3Pi8obLh
Lovely to join artist Ruth E. Lyons to celebrate the installation of her sculpture 'Superunification' in Honeypark https://t.co/Tqzml3gbyB

Thanks to everyone who was in contact with feedback around delays at the Passport Office, particularly for new applications and passports for children.   I raised the issue in the Dáil today, Minister Simon Coveney needs to redeploy staff to clear the backlog of applications. https://t.co/LdpiMTKeXG
@ciarandonohoe Hi Ciaran, I know it is very bad. I understand it is due to commence soon but I'll try to get an exact date for you.
@DonalSmithCllr @dlrcc @KBC_UCD @Tennis_Ireland @dlrcommunity Great to see them installed

Raised the situation at Dublin Airport in the Dáil this afternoon - including the appalling scenes of violence witnessed last night during a brawl at a departure gate.  Thank you to Minister Darragh O'Brien @DarraghOBrienTD for providing an update on behalf of the Government https://t.co/IFe5WT8B5q
Pleasure to welcome US Congressman Richard Neal, a great friend of Ireland, to Dáil Éireann for discussions about the Good Friday Agreement and the NI Protocol https://t.co/iyi1b5jpZp

Raised need to support the work of journalists, photo-journalists and media in conflict areas around the world, particularly in light of the killing of Pierre Zakrzewski in Ukraine and Shireen Abu Akleh in Jenin earlier this month. https://t.co/Vch7LO2Fo0

Great to see Dún Laoghaire Town being featured in this week's @dublinpeople.   Congratulations to @Frewen_Aylward on being awarded All-Ireland Menswear Retailer of the Year 👏👏  @DunLaoghaireTn @DunLaoghaireTT @dunlaoghairecra  https://t.co/qKjDUbQElq

@garrydeehan @flossiebeachcl1 @Ballybrackact @Ballybrackact are doing fantastic work in the area, especially in Loughlinstown Forest along the river. I actually raised the need to protect & support the forest during a Dáil debate yesterday on the new National Parks and Wildlife Service strategy. https://t.co/fyV8GLsZrj

Great to see Killiney and Seapoint awarded Blue Flags today!  Thanks to everyone involved in keeping the seafront and surrounding areas clean - Killiney Bay Community Council, Dalkey Tidy Towns, Flossie And The Beach Cleaners, Monkstown Tidy District and DLR staff 👏 https://t.co/42odd9DVYL

Pleased to meet & engage with Poland’s Deputy Minister of Foreign Affairs @SzSz_velSek earlier this evening as part of Irish - Polish Parliamentary relations. Thanks to Her Excellency, Ambassador Anna @Sochanska & @Kildare4Lawless for arranging it. 🇮🇪🇵🇱 #StandingWithUkraine 🇺🇦 https://t.co/jD47JY5Nsq
Wonderful to have the opportunity at a Dáil debate this week to pay tribute to the work of Gardaí in Dún Laoghaire over the past 100 years. https://t.co/2A2XJSaQvF

Thank you to the 5th & 6th year students from @SionHillCollege for inviting me in to their school and for their warm welcome and their thorough engagement on a broad range of issues. https://t.co/XbJlJLC6YA
@ellemphillips Thank you Elle, you’re very welcome. I’ll let David know.

Medical Laboratory Scientists in many Irish hospitals are due to strike tomorrow, I raised the matter with the Taoiseach, calling for a fair settlement for @MedLabAssoc Medical Scientists and priority to be given to any @IrishPatients impacted. https://t.co/2WNHJ80Tgk

🇮🇪 🇱🇹I was joined by Lithuanian MP #DaliaAsanvičiūtè as we hosted a thought provoking discussion with our colleagues from the #Seimas as well as the #Dail & #Seanad earlier today. We look forward to further meetings, discussions and collaboration between #Ireland and #Lithuania https://t.co/ywRsFKg5zn

It was a pleasure to meet the Indian Ambassador to Ireland, His Excellency @AkhileshIFS & @ReetiMishra_ along with my Party colleague @sean_haughey - thank you for the meaningful discussion and friendship. #Ireland #India 🇮🇪🇮🇳 https://t.co/3MW6CWrN8f
What an incredible moment 🇺🇦 #SlavaUkraine #Eurovision2022 https://t.co/L4JS05eQEX
Lovely to join serving and retired Gardaí and their families at Dún Laoghaire Garda Station to mark their service to the area over the past 100 years. https://t.co/RZk491S9lw
Thanks to St Laurence College #Loughlinstown @stlaurencecoll2 for the very warm welcome yesterday to their school from both staff and students alike. https://t.co/IQmyFN0Ktt

I want to join the Taoiseach in his praise and gratitude for the tremendous work undertaken by the Deputy Chief Medical Officer, Dr Ronan Glynn over the last number of years, especially during the #COVID19 pandemic. I wish him every success in the future.  https://t.co/rmEDJST77G

Wonderful morning for the #DarknessintoLight walk in Kilbogget Park, great to see the whole community come together.   Thank you to Brian and all the volunteers from Cabinteely Athletic Club, the Civil Defence and everyone who looked after us.  👏  #thepowerofhope #dil2022 https://t.co/rR5aeJTWaB
Lovely to join President Michael D Higgins and Sabina at Otranto Park in Sandycove for the unveiling of "Stele" a new sculpture by Imogen Stuart. https://t.co/JvPhTYzwfN

It was wonderful to join @alzheimersocirl today as part of their #TeaDay2022  Thanks to Minister @MaryButlerTD for giving so much her time and support to #dementia and to @Fiona_Kildare for arranging today. You can donate here https://t.co/q0Dp2AIreO #TogetherForTea @andrewmheff https://t.co/CizYN10ViN

Poignant ceremony at Shankill Garda Station to mark the centenary of the arrival of the first Civic Guards to Shankill & the contribution of Gardaí to the area over the past 100 years.   Great to be joined by Councillors Michael Clark, Jim Gildea, Carrie Smyth & Denis O'Callaghan https://t.co/CSYMGUKqDK
@CharlieFlanagan @EmerHigginsTD @gerryhorkan Thanks  you for your support and participation Charlie

Welcoming my fellow convenor of the Irish - Lithuanian Parliamentary Friendship Group @Simcikute to Leinster House today along with colleagues from @LRSeimas & @OireachtasNews 🇮🇪 🇱🇹 #Lithuania #Ireland #StandWithUkraine https://t.co/zjV8ppPdQX

Great news this morning for Dún Laoghaire Harbour - over €3 million has been allocated for repair & maintenance projects.   The funds will be allocated from the Brexit Adjustment Reserve and I want to thank @fiannafailparty Minister Charlie @McConalogue for securing the funding https://t.co/UwVUu3taGr
The horror continues in Ukraine with the relentless attacks on innocent civilians and a sovereign, peace loving country.  May they rest in peace. https://t.co/In8G7crok8

Thank you to all of the team in the @Downsyndromecen in #Sandyford for inviting me in to witness the wonderful work that you do.I look forward to working with you over the months and years ahead. https://t.co/dzBL7hlnXF #Downsyndrome https://t.co/73v4mW3iw6

Stalking and non-fatal strangulation are now standalone offences  Well done @lichamber & @HMcEntee for delivering this important change to the law which will help protect people from domestic, sexual and gender based violence https://t.co/kFMqtT6Dut

Visiting Woodside in Sandford with Minister Darragh O'Brien for the launch of Ireland's latest public housing scheme - 50 #CostRental & 105 #SocialHousing units.   Well done to DLR, Tuath & Respond who developed them with support from Govt. Great to see #HousingforAll working 👍 https://t.co/3JvR8e1eGN

Delighted to see DLR Councillors agree to allocate land at the former Mount Anville Depot to create a permeant home for Gaelscoil Laighean. It's been a long road, well done to the parents & the whole school community for keeping the campaign going 👏 https://t.co/mmWGG2E5wC

It was wonderful to visit Shankill Tennis Club with Cllr Michael Clark over the weekend.  Congratulations to Veronica Casey who has been elected chairperson of the club. She takes over from Liam O'Donohoe who served as chair for 3 years & has been a club stalwart for decades. https://t.co/NthuqEuoce
